lead_paragraph: At least 42 people, including 13 children, were killed after a bus collided with a trailer truck in southern Pakistan in one of the nation’s worst traffic accidents in years, officials said.

byline.contributor: Zia ur-Rehman reported from Karachi, and Salman Masood from Islamabad, Pakistan.
byline.original: By ZIA ur-REHMAN and SALMAN MASOOD

snippet: At least 42 people, including 13 children, were killed after a bus collided with a trailer truck in southern Pakistan in one of the nation’s worst traffic accidents in years, officials said....
abstract: At least 42 people, including 13 children, are killed after a bus collides with a trailer truck in southern Pakistan, in one of the nation’s worst traffic accidents in years.

headline.main: More Than 40 People Killed in Bus Accident in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: More Than 40 People Killed in Bus Accident in Pakistan
